name: Traffic Heavy Bike Race: City Moto Rider
name_original: Traffic Heavy Bike Race: City Moto Rider
description:
Get ready to beat the traffic on heavy duty super bikes. In Traffic Heavy Bike: City Moto Rider rush through the busy highway traffic on your heavy bikes, ride through the edgy corners, and pass the heavy traffic without being crashed! Become a master motorcycle / motocross biker, start riding right now to become a pro bike racer and rule them all. It will be fun and addicting, its guarantee! Tilt your mobile device to lean your bike and touch the screen to accelerate or brake. It's very easy to learn, but hard to master!
Play an extreme battle racing experience in Traffic Heavy Bike: City Moto Rider
You will control an ultimate maniac motorbike rider. Go garage and select one of the high performance race motorbikes. You can upgrade their speed, handling, and breaking features with game points. To earn points, race in extreme speed on endless road with multiple highway environments. Play either in endless one way traffic mode or two way traffic. Multiple locations: City, Village, and Snow.
Perform close overtakes for more action! The road is filed with cars, trucks, buses, and motorcycles. With the fist button, the rider can punch and kick the other motorbike riders. Be an adrenaline junkie and like extreme sports, this ultimate bike racing game is for you. You have everything you need for traffic battle there. Just use them only in game to blow off steam with Traffic Heavy Bike: City Moto Rider.
